entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 4 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening and ending after midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
